технический ресурс abstract a new approach is proposed for determining repair methods based on the possibility of providing the casing with a protective potential close to the design number of pipeline crossings through roads and railways the novelty and relevance of this method is due to the determination of the actual value of the current required to protect the casing using an experimental mobile cathode station the results of calculations and experimental data confirm the validity of the method the presented approach can be used by the operational services in determining it is shown that with an increase in stress the parameters of elasticity and viscosity decrease which describes the sequential transition of bischofite from the elastic stage to the decaying steady with the valves closed a heat agent is pumped into the column due to which the adjacent zone of the productive reservoir warms up and the viscosity of the formation oil decreases further the agent supply is stopped after which with open valves gas is injected into the annular space with a demulsifier or paraffin formation inhibitor in a finely dispersed state to reduce pressure losses due to friction and prevent precipitation of paraffin deposits on the inner wall of the column this process is cyclic and as the oil cools and viscosity increases the process is repeated ключевой слово estimation of fracture conductivity is essential for optimizing hydraulic fracturing calculations this paper provides an overview of modern analytical models of hydraulic fracture conductivity and contains analysis the influence of various input parameters on each of the models for comparison with the experimental data a calculation was performed using experimental parameters in each model based on the results of the calculation a model was identified with the help of which the most accurate agreement with the experimental data was obtained recommendations are proposed to improve the accuracy of the concurrence of the calculated conductivity values ключевой слово гидравлический разрыв пласт проводимость трещина аналитический модель моделирование гидравлический разрыв пласт hydraulic drive dead арктический зона abstract the readings of well magnetometers used in directional drilling may be distorted by geomagnetic storms the goal of this research is to study the impact of the sporadic fluctuations of the magnetic field associated with geomagnetic storms on the key parameters of the directional drilling trajectory based on geomagnetic field navigation from middle to high latitudes we show that in high latitudes the impact on the borehole geometrical parameters becomes critical and results in unacceptable deviations thus accurate navigation requires deployment of stationary geomagnetic observatories of the highest standard in the arctic zone as well as new mathematical methods for the real time telemetry data correction ключевой слово геомагнитный displacing oil by a polymer solution in addition the deposition of polymer particles in the collector capillaries is observed due to their adsorption on the rock skeleton the result of these processes is the deformation of the porometric curve the type of which in turn affects the relative phase permeability of oil and water percolation modeling allows us to consider the processes occurring at the micro level in a porous medium in more detail using this approach makes it possible to optimize the parameters of the polymer solution air mixture freely escapes into the atmosphere which leads not only to the loss of valuable vapors but also to environmental damage the process of displacement of vapors from the gas space of a tanker is described by a system of differential equations in which many parameters are very difficult to determine in practice in this regard the authors of the work on the basis of the already obtained differential equation by means of a computational experiment obtained criterion equations for describing the dynamics of the displacement of the gas phase during tanker loading ключевой слово танкер нефть нефтепродукт погрузка испарение keywords tanker oil oil
